sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { IonContent, IonHeader, IonPage, IonTitle, IonCard, IonCardHeader, IonCardTitle, IonCardContent, IonButton, IonModal, IonItem, IonLabel, IonSelect, IonSelectOption, IonGrid, IonRow, IonCol, IonList } from '@ionic/react'; import './Tab2.css'; import { bluetoothComponent } from '../components/BluetoothButton'; let mapStr:string = "m " let buttonToMap:string | undefined = "" let buttonMapped:boolean = false let modMapped:boolean = false let animMapped:boolean = false let animNumStr:string = "" let modMapStr:string = "" function updateMapStr(data:string | undefined, type:string) { if (type == "button") { if (data == "button1") buttonToMap = "1" if (data == "button2") buttonToMap = "2" if (data == "button3") buttonToMap = "3" if (data == "button4") buttonToMap = "4" buttonMapped = true } if (type == "anim") { let animNum:string = "0" // Images if (data == "Neutral") animNum = "0" if (data == "Cheerful") animNum = "1" if (data == "Starry-eyed") animNum = "2" if (data == "Excited") animNum = "3" if (data == "Happy shock") animNum = "4" if (data == "Sad shock") animNum = "5" if (data == "Teary") animNum = "6" if (data == "Bluescreen") animNum = "7" if (data == "Unimpressed") animNum = "8" if (data == "Angry") animNum = "9" if (data == "Dead") animNum = "10" if (data == "Table flip") animNum = "11" if (data == "Party Parrot") animNum = "12" if (data == "Rickroll") animNum = "13" if (data == "The Game") animNum = "14" if (data == "This is fine") animNum = "15" animNumStr = animNum animMapped = true } if (type == "mod") { let modMapping:string = "0" // Button Combinations if (buttonToMap == "1" && data == "noMod") modMapping = "0" if (buttonToMap == "1" && data == "mod1") modMapping = "1" if (buttonToMap == "1" && data == "mod2") modMapping = "2" if (buttonToMap == "1" && data == "mod12") modMapping = "3" if (buttonToMap == "2" && data == "noMod") modMapping = "4" if (buttonToMap == "2" && data == "mod1") modMapping = "5" if (buttonToMap == "2" && data == "mod2") modMapping = "6" if (buttonToMap == "2" && data == "mod12") modMapping = "7" if (buttonToMap == "3" && data == "noMod") modMapping = "8" if (buttonToMap == "3" && data == "mod1") modMapping = "9" if (buttonToMap == "3" && data == "mod2") modMapping = "10" if (buttonToMap == "3" && data == "mod12") modMapping = "11" if (buttonToMap == "4" && data == "noMod") modMapping = "12" if (buttonToMap == "4" && data == "mod1") modMapping = "13" if (buttonToMap == "4" && data == "mod2") modMapping = "14" if (buttonToMap == "4" && data == "mod12") modMapping = "15" modMapStr = modMapping modMapped = true } return data } function submitStr() { if (buttonMapped && modMapped && animMapped) { buttonMapped = false modMapped = false animMapped = false sendButtonMapping(mapStr) mapStr = "m " buttonToMap = "" } return false } function sendButtonMapping(data:string) { console.log(data) if (bluetoothComponent.bluetooth_started) { bluetoothComponent.send_to_pi(data) return data } else { console.log("Bluetooth connection has not been established!") return data } } const Tab2: React.FC = () => { const [showModal1, setShowModal1] = useState(false); const [showModal2, setShowModal2] = useState(false); const [buttonChoice, setButtonChoice] = useState(); const [modChoice, setModChoice] = useState(); const [animChoice, setAnimChoice] = useState(); return (
Temperature XXÂ°C Humidity YY%

Enter new temperature and humidity preferences

Fans will turn on when conditions inside the helmet exceed these values.

setShowModal1(false)}>Ok setShowModal1(true)} color="success" shape="round" expand="block"> Change temperature & humidity preferences No mod Mod 1 Mod 2 Mods 1 & 2 Button 1 Neutral Cheerful Starry-eyed Excited Button 2 Happy shock Sad shock Teary Bluescreen Button 3 Unimpressed Angry Dead Table flip Button 4 Party Parrot Rickroll The Game This is fine Button updateMapStr(e.detail.value, "button")}> 1 2 3 4 Modifier updateMapStr(e.detail.value, "mod")}> none 1 2 1 & 2 Animation updateMapStr(e.detail.value, "anim")}> Neutral Cheerful Starry-eyed Excited Happy shock Sad shock Teary Bluescreen Unimpressed Angry Dead Table flip Party Parrot Rickroll The Game This is fine setShowModal2( submitStr() )}>Ok setShowModal2(true)} color="success" shape="round" expand="block"> Change animation mapping
); }; export default Tab2;
